revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Dark Cave |image = [[File:Dark Cave.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Dark Cave |tokens = 6,500 |location = Between Route 45 and 46, south of Blackthorn City. }} '''Dark Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Normal || 127,000 |- | Boss || 400,000 |}
===Pokémon===
* Zubat * Geodude * Golbat * Graveler * Wobuffet * Dunsparce (boss)
===Items===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | [[XClick|xClick]] || 50% |- | [[Item Magnet]] || 50% |}
